text: Oleksandr Rojtburd (Ukrainian Олександр Анатолійович Ройтбурд; 14 October 1961 - 8 August 2021) was a Ukrainian artist. He was the co-founder of the theory of the Ukrainian Transavantgard. He worked as a painter and installation artist. From March 2018 to September 4, 2019 he was the director of the Odesa Art Museum. Rojtburd was born in Odesa, Ukraine. Rojtburd died on 8 August 2021 in Kyiv at the age of 59.Умер известный украинский художник Ройтбурд Олександра Ройтбурда поховають на Єврейському цвинтарі в Одесі ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2021 deaths Category:People from Odesa Category:Ukrainian painters Category:20th-century artists
title: Oleksandr Rojtburd
